description: A welcoming contemporary-style restaurant in the town’s historical centre where the young owner-chef has plenty of experience behind him, including in his parents’ restaurant. At Coquus, he serves fresh cuisine which is seasonal, full of flavour and reasonably priced given the quality on offer. Efficient and enthusiastic service, with an outdoor space in the pedestrian area for summer dining.
